attributes.action: have the courage to add a "coalition" box to voting forms, both local and national.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We supposedly live in a democratic society and have the right to choose who runs our country. Yet we are never offered all the options. We ask only that we are given the right to choose what we believe to be best for our country.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Change-Vote-Laws/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
